mapper.select: SELECT items.id, items.name, items.category_id AS categoryId, items.amount, items.deadline, items.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, items.others, items.status, items.favorite_flg AS favorite, categories.name AS categoryName FROM items INNER JOIN categories ON items.category_id = categories.id WHERE items.status <> 0 ORDER BY items.id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO items( name, category_id, amount, deadline, purchase_date, others, status, favorite_flg ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{amount}, #{deadline}, #{purchaseDate}, #{others}, #{status}, #{favorite} )
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET status = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.name, i.category_id AS categoryId, c.name AS categoryName, i.amount, i.deadline, i.purchase_date AS purchaseDate, i.others, i.status, i.favorite_flg AS favorite FROM items i LEFT JOIN categories c ON i.category_id = c.id WHERE i.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE items SET name = #{name}, category_id = #{categoryId}, amount = #{amount}, deadline = #{deadline}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, others = #{others}, favorite_flg = #{favorite} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_list( item_id, name, category_id, amount, purchase_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{amount}, #{purchaseDate} )
